index_terms: CULTURAL CENTERS DEPARTMENT OF PARKS AND RECREATION
summary: AN ORDINANCE related to repairing flood damage to the Daybreak Star Indian Cultural Center; appropriating funds to the Department of Parks and Recreation; amending the 2006-2011 Capital Improvement Program; and authorizing the Superintendent of Parks and Recreation to enter into a contract with the United Indians of All Tribes Foundation to manage the repairs; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
